definition: variant of 盈餘|盈余[ying2 yu2]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: I'd rather keep a constant surplus in terms of money.
sentences.chinese: 在錢的方面，我情願經常保持有贏餘。

sentences.english: After only three months, the company was able to breakeven and stop making profits.
sentences.chinese: 才僅僅過了三個月，這家公司已經沒有贏餘沒有利潤。

sentences.english: He can continue to support himself and his family only if he produces a surplus.
sentences.chinese: 惟有使糧食贏餘，他才能繼續養活自己及家人。
